item.description:
At the Waterfront Pavillion - should be a blast!

http://www.ticketmast...

Great restaurants in the surrounding area (Anthonys, Legal Test Kitchen, etc) lots of parking. Waterfront ambiance, lots of snack food and beer at the tent. Don't worry about attire - shorts, sandals even a hawaiian shirt would work.

This is a true summertime event in the Seaport area which is really getting nice since it's rebirth. There's even a college-kid run rickshaw service if you're too tanked to walk back to the parking lot! Remember - the designated driver rides the rickshaw free so if you're draining the keg at the tent bring a couple extra bucks to show you care!
item.name: George Thorogood & the Destroyers, Bryan Adams
